pages.text: The machine operator transfers items specified in the dimensional storage actuator GUI, to it's managed machine, and returns crafting results to the storage system. It can also be used to automatically empty a chest into the storage actuator.

To use the machine operator use the book of calling to link a Storage Actuator, the machine and optionally a separate extract location (the face you click on will be extracted from!). For the machine you can additionally set a custom name and the insert/extract facings. Please note that setting a new machine (or configuring it with the book of calling) will reset the extraction settings.
